org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql

Packages that use org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
Factories for geodetic objects defined in a SQL database, typically the EPSG dataset.
  • Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql used by org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
    Class
    Description
    EPSGDataAccess
    Data Access Object (DAO) creating geodetic objects from a JDBC connection to an EPSG database.
    EPSGFactory
    A geodetic object factory backed by the EPSG database.
    SQLTranslator
    Translator of SQL statements for variations in schema, table and column names.
